preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 50 g of magnesium using a precision scale.
2. Measure 70 g of scandium.
3. Measure 160 g of tin.
4. Measure 80 g of yttrium.
5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured ingredients thoroughly.
